lead_paragraph: Scott Speed, the only American driver in Formula One, was dropped by the Toro Rosso team and replaced with Sebastian Vettel of Germany. Speed, a 24-year-old from Manteca, Calif., has not finished in the top eight of any race in his two Formula One seasons.
